content:
Question: Rift Valley Province is located in a nation that uses which form of currency? 
Observation: Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[Rift Valley Province, location.administrative_division.country, Kenya], [Kenya, location.country.capital, Nairobi], [Kenya, location.country.currency_used, Kenyan shilling]]

Thought: To answer the question about the currency used in the nation where Rift Valley Province is located, I first need to confirm which country it is. The most relevant triple here is the one that directly connects Rift Valley Province to its country. 
Action: Choose[Rift Valley Province, location.administrative_division.country, Kenya]
Observation: Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[Kenya, location.country.currency_used, Kenyan shilling],[Kenya, language, English]]

Thought: Now that I know Rift Valley Province is in Kenya, I need to find out what form of currency Kenya uses. The most relevant triple from the previous observation is the one that specifies Kenya's currency. 
Action: Choose[Kenya, location.country.currency_used, Kenyan shilling]
Observation: Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[Kenyan shilling, used_year, 1966],[Kenyan shilling, used.country, Kenyan]]

Thought: With the information that Kenya uses the Kenyan shilling as its currency, I can now answer the original question about the currency used in the nation where Rift Valley Province is located. 
Action: Finish[Kenyan shilling]

Question: The artist nominated for The Long Winter lived where? Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[The Long Winter, book.written_work.author, Laura Ingalls Wilder], [Laura Ingalls Wilder, people.person.date_of_birth, 1867-02-07], [Laura Ingalls Wilder, people.person.place_of_birth, Pepin, Wisconsin]]

Thought: To find out where the artist nominated for The Long Winter lived, I first need to identify the author of the book. The most relevant triple here is the one that connects The Long Winter to its author. 
Action: Choose[The Long Winter, book.written_work.author, Laura Ingalls Wilder]

Observation: Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[Laura Ingalls Wilder, people.person.date_of_birth, 1867-02-07], [Laura Ingalls Wilder, people.person.place_of_birth, Pepin, Wisconsin], [Laura Ingalls Wilder, people.place_lived.location, De Smet, South Dakota]]

Thought: Now that I know Laura Ingalls Wilder is the author of The Long Winter, I need to find out where she lived. The most relevant triple from the previous observation is the one that specifies her place of residence. 
Action: Choose[Laura Ingalls Wilder, people.place_lived.location, De Smet, South Dakota]

Observation: Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[De Smet, South Dakota, location.in_country, United States], [De Smet, South Dakota, location.historic_significance, Little House on the Prairie series], [Laura Ingalls Wilder, people.place_lived.location, De Smet, South Dakota]]

Thought: With the information that Laura Ingalls Wilder lived in De Smet, South Dakota, I can now answer the original question about where the artist nominated for The Long Winter lived. 
Action: Finish[De Smet, South Dakota]

Question: The inventor of the telephone was born where? Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[Alexander Graham Bell, people.person.date_of_birth, 1847-03-03], [Alexander Graham Bell, people.person.place_of_birth, Edinburgh, Scotland], [Telephone, invention.inventor, Alexander Graham Bell]]

Thought: To determine where the inventor of the telephone was born, I need to identify the inventor first. I see that the triple connects the telephone with Alexander Graham Bell as its inventor. 
Action: Choose[Telephone, invention.inventor, Alexander Graham Bell]

Observation: Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[Alexander Graham Bell, people.person.date_of_birth, 1847-03-03], [Alexander Graham Bell, people.person.place_of_birth, Edinburgh, Scotland]]

Thought: Now that I have identified Alexander Graham Bell as the inventor, I need to find out where he was born. The relevant triple from the observation is the one specifying his place of birth. 
Action: Choose[Alexander Graham Bell, people.person.place_of_birth, Edinburgh, Scotland]

Observation: Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[Edinburgh, Scotland, location.in_country, United Kingdom], [Edinburgh, Scotland, location.historic_significance, Capital of Scotland], [Alexander Graham Bell, people.person.date_of_birth, 1847-03-03]]

Thought: With the information that Alexander Graham Bell was born in Edinburgh, Scotland, I can now answer the question regarding the birthplace of the inventor of the telephone. 
Action: Finish[Edinburgh, Scotland]

Question: What is the birthplace of the composer of The Four Seasons? Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[Antonio Vivaldi, music.composer.composition, The Four Seasons], [The Four Seasons, music.composition.composer, Antonio Vivaldi], [Antonio Vivaldi, music.person.date_of_birth, 1678-03-04]]

Thought: To find out the birthplace of the composer of The Four Seasons, I first need to identify the composer. The relevant triple linking The Four Seasons to Antonio Vivaldi can help me here. 
Action: Choose[The Four Seasons, music.composition.composer, Antonio Vivaldi]
Observation: Here are some candidate knowledge triplets you can choose from: [[Antonio Vivaldi, music.person.date_of_birth, 1678-03-04], [The Four Seasons, music.composition.genre, Baroque]]

Thought: No relevant information were found from the candidate knowledge triplets. Based on previous information and my own knowledge, I know Antonio Vivaldi was born in Venice, Italy. 
Action: Finish[Venice, Italy]
